iti97:2.1_0: “Kalyāṇasīlo, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇadhammo kalyāṇapañño imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ‘kevalī vusitavā uttamapuriso’ti vuccati—
iti97:3.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sīlavā hoti, pātimokkhasaṁvarasaṁvuto viharati, ācāragocarasampanno aṇumattesu vajjesu bhayadassāvī, samādāya sikkhati sikkhāpadesu.
iti97:3.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇasīlo hoti.
iti97:4.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu sattannaṁ bodhipakkhiyānaṁ dhammānaṁ bhāvanānuyogamanuyutto viharati.
iti97:4.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇadhammo hoti.
iti97:5.2_0: Idha, bhikkhave, bhikkhu āsavānaṁ khayā anāsavaṁ cetovimuttiṁ paññāvimuttiṁ diṭṭheva dhamme sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā upasampajja viharati.
iti97:5.3_0: Evaṁ kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu kalyāṇapañño hoti.
iti97:6.1_0: Iti kalyāṇasīlo kalyāṇadhammo kalyāṇapañño imasmiṁ dhammavinaye ‘kevalī vusitavā uttamapuriso’ti vuccatī”ti.
iti97:11.1_0: Ayampi attho vutto bhagavatā, iti me sutanti.
